name: Molecular Repair Hair Oil
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Oil
about: What it is:A biotech-engineered, weightless oil that works on all hair types to strengthen, repair damage, reduce frizz at two levels of the hair fiber, and improve shine..Hair Type:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Texture:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Frizz.Key Benefits:- Reverses damage caused by frizz.Highlighted Ingredients:- K18PEPTIDE: Reverses hair damage that causes frizz, promotes strength and smoothness..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This strengthening, smoothing hair oil works on two levels of the hair fiber to fight frizz. The K18PEPTIDE works to address deeper level damage that causes frizz, repairing and strengthening damage at the innermost layer of the hair fiber to reverse  damage that leads to frizz..Fragrance Description:Fresh floral scent..Clinical Results:In a 3rd party clinical study, one use of the K18 Molecular Repair Hair Oil delivered:
ingredients: -K18PEPTIDE: Reverses hair damage that causes frizz, promotes strength and smoothness..-Hemisqualane and Squalane: Reinforce hair's moisture barrier, smooth flyaways, enhance shine..-Avocado Oil: Provides heat protection up to 450u00b0F (232u00b0C)...Caprylyl Caprylate/Caprate, Squalane, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil, C13-15 Alkane, Undecane, Benzyl Alcohol, Tridecane, Castor Isostearate Succinate, Propanediol, sh-Oligopeptide-78, Fragrance (Parfum), Tocopherol, Cinnamal, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Designed to be used on both damp and dry hair for maximum impact..-This is a highly concentrated formula. Start with one to three drops and build as needed..-Apply to damp hair from mid-lengths to ends before styling. .-Apply to dry hair as a finisher. .-Can be used after the K18 Leave-In Molecular Repair Hair Mask (after four-minute processing time, sold separately) for enhanced softening and styling benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have wavy/ curly long fine hair that is low porosity. I very rarely heat style my hair, so this review is for my experience with air drying. When I got out of the shower I dried my hair with a towel, rubbed two drops between my hands, applied to my hair, and brushed to distribute. Unfortunately, I could tell this oil wasnu2019t for me almost instantly. As my hair was drying, I noticed a lot more frizz, and when it fully dried it felt like there was a coating on my hair that made it feel waxy. I normally wash my hair every 3-4 days, however I had to wash it the following day. Maybe if I was someone who heat styled it would be different, however I will be returning this as there is no room for it in my air drying routin
